message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with!
I'll take the high road, let's see if you'll take the low road!
I'll take a slightly more generous approach this time. How about we compromise on a 60/40 split?
You're getting closer, but I'm not ready to give in yet!
I'm willing to make a bigger concession. How about we try a 70/30 split?
You're getting closer, but I'm still not ready to give in...
I'm willing to make another big concession. How about we try an 75/25 split?
You're running out of time, I'm not budging!
I'm making one last big push. How about we try an 80/20 split?
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
